mapper.select: select category_id from post_categories where post_id=#{postid} and siteid=#{siteid}
select id ,name,slug from categories where slug=#{slug} and siteid=#{siteid}
select id ,name,slug,create_time as createTime,thumbnail,description,parent_id as parentId from categories where siteid=#{siteid} order by create_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from categories where siteid=#{siteid} and id=#{id}
